text: Keen to beat the rush hour congestion, you wake up early and hop in your car to set off for work. The hours fly by and soon enough it’s time for your lunch break. Strolling down the high street, the smell of Bill’s burger van is irresistible, so you buy a large beef burger with bacon. You don’t feel great about your less eco-friendly decisions but there is always tomorrow, and after all, they do say that necessity is the mother of invention...
